description:
A modified browser built using Electron that helps in responsive web development.


What's Changed
- Masonry Layout by @saiTharunDusa in responsively-org/responsively-app#1311
- Add notifications by @violetadev in responsively-org/responsively-app#1313
- Colour contrast loss simulation by @donneypr in responsively-org/responsively-app#1351
- Option to customise Accept Language header by @happymvp in responsively-org/responsively-app#1334
- Address bar bug fix by @Asatyam in responsively-org/responsively-app#1307
- Minor layout fixes by @udayjordan in responsively-org/responsively-app#1323
- Fix bug where updating or removing URL query params not updating the page by @mohamed1408 in responsively-org/responsively-app#1337
- Fixed a Mobile landscape layout bug by @happymvp in responsively-org/responsively-app#1340
- Added iPhone 15 line-up to devices list by @donneypr in responsively-org/responsively-app#1344
- Minor UI Polish by @manojVivek in responsively-org/responsively-app#1355
Misc
- Update Roadmap to desktop link that is not working README.md by @QaisarMoin in responsively-org/responsively-app#1304
New Contributors
- @Asatyam made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#1307
- @QaisarMoin made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#1304
- @saiTharunDusa made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#1311
- @udayjordan made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#1323
- @happymvp made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#1334
- @mohamed1408 made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#1337
- @donneypr made their first contribution in responsively-org/responsively-app#1344
